AdditionalDetails.description: Additional information provided by the selling party for tax-related or any other purpose.

detail.description: The detail of the additional information provided by the selling party.

languageCode.description: The language code of the additional information detail.

type.description: The type of the additional information provided by the selling party.

x-docgen-enum-table-extension.description: An additional tax on something already taxed, such as a higher rate of tax on incomes above a certain level.
OCR.
The total number of cartons invoiced.

city.description: The city where the person, business or institution is located.

countryCode.description: The two digit country code. In ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 format.

county.description: The county where person, business or institution is located.

district.description: The district where person, business or institution is located.

name.description: The name of the person, business or institution at that address.

phone.description: The phone number of the person, business or institution located at that address.

postalOrZipCode.description: The postal or zip code of that address. It contains a series of letters or digits or both, sometimes including spaces or punctuation.

stateOrRegion.description: The state or region where person, business or institution is located.

AllowanceDetails.description: Monetary and tax details of the allowance.

taxDetails.description: Tax amount details applied on this allowance.

x-docgen-enum-table-extension.description: Discount allowance.
Discount incentive allowance.
Allowance applied for defective item.
Promotional allowance.
Allowance applied due to unsaleable merchandise.
Special allowances.

ChargeDetails.description: Monetary and tax details of the charge.

taxDetails.description: Tax amount details applied on this charge.

x-docgen-enum-table-extension.description: Freight charges.
Packing fee.
Duty charges.
Service fee.
Small order fee.
Insurance placement cost.
Insurance fee.
Special handling service fee.
Collection and recycling service fee.
Environmental protection service fee.
Tax collected at source.

CreditNoteDetails.description: References required in order to process a credit note. This information is required only if InvoiceType is CreditNote.

consignorsReferenceNumber.description: Identifies the consignor reference number (VRET number), if generated by Amazon.

coopReferenceNumber.description: Identifies the COOP reference used for COOP agreement. Failure to provide the COOP reference number or the Debit Note number may lead to a rejection of the Credit Note.

debitNoteNumber.description: Debit Note Number as generated by Amazon. Recommended for Returns and COOP Credit Notes.

referenceInvoiceNumber.description: Original Invoice Number when sending a credit note relating to an existing invoice. One Invoice only to be processed per Credit Note. This is mandatory for AP Credit Notes.

returnsReferenceNumber.description: Identifies the Returns Notice Number. Mandatory for all Returns Credit Notes.

rmaId.description: Identifies the Returned Merchandise Authorization ID, if generated.

DateTime.description: Defines a date and time according to ISO8601.

Decimal.description:
A decimal number with no loss of precision. Useful when precision loss is unacceptable, as with currencies. Follows RFC7159 for number representation.
**Pattern** : `^-?(0|([1-9]\d*))(\.\d+)?([eE][+-]?\d+)?$`.

Error.description: Error response returned when the request is unsuccessful.

code.description: An error code that identifies the type of error that occurred.

details.description: Additional details that can help the caller understand or fix the issue.

message.description: A message that describes the error condition.

ErrorList.description: A list of error responses returned when a request is unsuccessful.

additionalDetails.description: Additional details provided by the selling party, for tax related or other purposes.

allowanceDetails.description: Total allowance amount details for all line items.

chargeDetails.description: Total charge amount details for all line items.

id.description: Unique number relating to the charges defined in this document. This will be invoice number if the document type is Invoice or CreditNote number if the document type is Credit Note. Failure to provide this reference will result in a rejection.

x-docgen-enum-table-extension.description: A commercial document issued by a seller to a buyer, relating to a sale transaction and indicating the products, quantities, and agreed prices for products or services the seller had provided the buyer.
A commercial document issued by a seller to a buyer. It is evidence of the reduction in sales.

referenceNumber.description: An additional unique reference number used for regulatory or other purposes.

taxDetails.description: Total tax amount details for all line items.

InvoiceItem.description: Details of the item being invoiced.

allowanceDetails.description: Individual allowance details per line item.

amazonProductIdentifier.description: Amazon Standard Identification Number (ASIN) of an item.

chargeDetails.description: Individual charge details per line item.

hsnCode.description: HSN Tax code. The HSN number cannot contain alphabets.

itemSequenceNumber.description: Unique number related to this line item.

purchaseOrderNumber.description: The Amazon purchase order number for this invoiced line item. Formatting Notes: 8-character alpha-numeric code. This value is mandatory only when invoiceType is Invoice, and is not required when invoiceType is CreditNote.

taxDetails.description: Individual tax details per line item.

vendorProductIdentifier.description: The vendor selected product identifier of the item. Should be the same as was provided in the purchase order.

amount.description: Quantity of an item. This value should not be zero.

unitOfMeasure.description: Unit of measure for the quantity.

x-docgen-enum-table-extension.description: Packing of individual items into a case.
Individual items.

unitSize.description: The case size, if the unit of measure value is Cases.

Money.description: An amount of money, including units in the form of currency.

currencyCode.description: Three-digit currency code in ISO 4217 format.

taxRegistrationDetails.description: Tax registration details of the party.

PaymentTerms.description: Terms of the payment for the invoice. The basis of the payment terms is the invoice date.

discountDueDays.description: The number of calendar days from the Base date (Invoice date) until the discount is no longer valid.

netDueDays.description: The number of calendar days from the base date (invoice date) until the total amount on the invoice is due.

type.description: The payment term type for the invoice.

x-docgen-enum-table-extension.description: Payment term that buyer and seller have agreed to.
Payment term where seller gets paid end of month.
Payment term where seller gets paid on a fixed date as agreed with buyer.
Payment term where seller gets paid end of following month.
Payment term where seller gets paid upon receipt of the invoice by the buyer.
A payment undertaking given by a bank to the seller and is issued on behalf of the applicant i.e. the buyer.

SubmitInvoicesRequest.description: The request schema for the submitInvoices operation.

SubmitInvoicesResponse.description: The response schema for the submitInvoices operation.

x-docgen-enum-table-extension.description: Central Goods and Services Tax (CGST) is levied by the Indian government for intrastate movement of goods and services.
State Goods and Services Tax (SGST) is an indirect tax levied and collected by a State Government in India on the intra-state supplies.
A CESS is a form of tax levied by the government on tax with specific purposes till the time the government gets enough money for that purpose.
Union Territory Goods and Services Tax in India.
Integrated Goods and Services Tax (IGST) is a tax levied on all Inter-State supplies of goods and/or services in India.
Mehrwertsteuer, MwSt, is German for value-added tax.
A provincial sales tax (PST) is imposed on consumers of goods and particular services in many Canadian provinces.
Taxe sur la Valeur Ajoutée (TVA) is French for value-added tax.
Value-added tax.
Tax levied on most goods and services sold for domestic consumption.
Sales tax.
Tax levied on consumption spending on goods and services.
Tax component that was mutually agreed upon between Amazon and vendor.
Domestic value-added tax.

TaxRegistrationDetails.description: Tax registration details of the entity.

taxRegistrationNumber.description: The tax registration number for the entity. For example, VAT ID.

taxRegistrationType.description: The tax registration type for the entity.

x-docgen-enum-table-extension.description: Value-added tax.
Goods and services tax.

transactionId.description: GUID to identify this transaction. This value can be used with the Transaction Status API to return the status of this transaction.

info.description: The Selling Partner API for Retail Procurement Payments provides programmatic access to vendors payments data.
info.title: Selling Partner API for Retail Procurement Payments

post.description:
Submit new invoices to Amazon.

**Usage Plans:**

| Plan type | Rate (requests per second) | Burst |
| ---- | ---- | ---- |
|Default| 10 | 10 |
|Selling partner specific| Variable | Variable |

The x-amzn-RateLimit-Limit response header returns the usage plan rate limits that were applied to the requested operation. Rate limits for some selling partners will vary from the default rate and burst shown in the table above. For more information, see "Usage Plans and Rate Limits" in the Selling Partner API documentation.

400.description: Request has missing or invalid parameters and cannot be parsed.

errors.message: Value 'Invoic' is not valid with respect to enumeration '[CreditNote, Invoice]'. It must be a value from the enumeration.
The value 'Invoic' of element 'invoiceType' is not valid.

403.description: Indicates that access to the resource is forbidden. Possible reasons include Access Denied, Unauthorized, Expired Token, or Invalid Signature.

404.description: The resource specified does not exist.

413.description: The request size exceeded the maximum accepted size.

415.description: The request payload is in an unsupported format.

429.description: The frequency of requests was greater than allowed.

500.description: An unexpected condition occurred that prevented the server from fulfilling the request.

503.description: Temporary overloading or maintenance of the server.
